title: Creating Educational Content and Structuring Practice
text: I launched the webtoon series 'Breath Stories' and planned the podcast 'Walking with Learning.' I realized that education is not just about delivery, but about 'sharing and discussing together.' By directly designing an after-school recording system, I aim to create a structure where teachers' practices can be preserved as data and reintegrated into education.

title: Beginning as a Planner and Researcher
text: I started working as an educational researcher at 'Sesangieum,' a new educational organization. I am designing an educational practice platform and creating actual classroom-based tools, allowing me to design education from a broader perspective. At the same time, my own educational philosophy has become even clearer.

title: Teacher Training Course Completion / Clinical Psychologist Qualification
text: I participated in and completed the Teachers' College for Life, and obtained my clinical psychologist qualification. This was a period where I deeply realized that a teacher's role goes beyond just teaching, requiring observation of children's inner worlds. I also attempted integrated subject classes and economic education material creation, putting collaborative growth of teachers into practice.

title: Acquired Qualifications Based on Activity Fields
text: I obtained qualifications as a Web Design Technician and a Cognitive Counselor for Slow Learners. The reason was singular: I wanted to understand more deeply and communicate better. To ensure an educational practitioner doesn't just explain with words, I began learning tools.

title: Deciding on a Transition, What is the Real Path?
text: While preparing for law school entrance exams, I pondered the intersection of 'law and education.' I passed the first stage and had an interview, but more significant than the result was the time I spent reflecting on my own direction. That year, by planning a metaverse festival using Gather Town, I also saw the potential for technology and education to meet.

title: Explaining Life with Educational Materials and Tools
text: From eating and washing to economic board games, I directly produced teaching materials and tools that connected to children's lives, laying the foundation for realizing 'learning in life.'

title: Experiment as an Educational Researcher Outside School
text: As a team leader for 'Aju Healthy Whisper,' I gained experience in educational research and program operation. This was a period where I attempted meaningful education at the boundary between public and private sectors.

title: Alternative Education, Early Anxiety and Conviction
text: I took my first steps as a teacher at Saramsarang Nanum School and grew into a team leader for Youth and Saramsarang, balancing Korean language instruction and life guidance.

title: Lessons Learned as a Homeroom Teacher
text: Working as a homeroom teacher at Saramsarang Nanum School, I became deeply involved in children's daily lives. This was a period where I learned that guidance is not a technique, but a relationship.

title: The Experiment of Choosing Career Counseling
text: While working as a content designer, I became interested in the keywords 'life and career' and obtained my career counselor qualification. I explored another possibility beyond being a teacher.

title: I Am a Prepared Teacher
text: I obtained my secondary school teacher qualifications in Korean Language and Moral Ethics and graduated from Dongguk University. This was the first step where the theory of learning began to move towards practice.

title: What Scholarships and Internships Taught Me
text: I worked for five semesters at the school library through a librarian work-study scholarship and received 'Excellent' evaluation during my teaching practicum. 'Diligence' was my strongest asset.

title: I Did My Best Even When Not Chosen
text: I received an award in the 'Good Teacher Competition' and pursued both teacher training and a double major. My attitude as a teacher was formed during this period.

title: Beginning, A Life as an Educator
text: I graduated from Gwangmyeongbuk High School and entered Dongguk University, majoring in Korean Language Education. Although it was still vague, my desire to work in a field that touched people's lives was clear.
